metadata.feature_description: Handles module installation, uninstallation, and version upgrades through manifest configuration.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify extension is installed and visible in Extensions list

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Extensions in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Extensions page should load showing installed extensions
steps.actual: Extensions page loaded successfully with Installed Extensions tab selected and Modules filter displayed

steps.action: Change filter from Modules to Libraries
steps.expected: Libraries list should display including Evoq.PersonaBar.UI
steps.actual: Libraries list displayed with Evoq.PersonaBar.UI visible at version 10.1.1

steps.action: Click on Evoq.PersonaBar.UI edit icon to view details
steps.expected: Extension details page should open showing package information
steps.actual: Extension details page opened showing Package Information tab with Name (Evoq.PersonaBar.UI), Friendly Name, Version (10.01.01), Owner (DNN), Organization (DNN Corp.), URL and Email fields
License tab displayed showing DotNetNuke license text with copyright notice and Accept License checkbox
Release Notes tab displayed showing 'There are no release notes for this version.' message

steps.action: Click Install Extension button on Extensions page
steps.expected: Install Extension wizard should open with file upload step
steps.actual: Install Extension wizard opened showing Step 1 of 5: 'Upload Extension Package' with drag-and-drop file upload area, Cancel and Next buttons. Next button correctly disabled until file is uploaded.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify extension list shows version and upgrade status

steps.action: View Modules list in Extensions page
steps.expected: Modules should display with Extension name, Version, In Use status, and Upgrade availability
steps.actual: Modules list displayed correctly showing Extension name, Version (e.g., 10.1.1, 9.3.2), In Use status (Yes/No clickable links), Upgrade? column with Update links, and action icons (edit/delete) per extension

steps.action: Review Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dnn manifest file for dependency declarations
steps.actual: Manifest correctly declares dependencies: CoreVersion 08.00.00, ManagedPackage Dnn.PersonaBar.UI v01.00.00, and package DotNetNuke.Professional. Azure compatibility is set to true. Install and Uninstall SQL scripts are configured.

steps.action: Review manifest for assembly registration configuration
steps.expected: Manifest should declare assemblies to be registered
steps.actual: Manifest correctly declares two assemblies: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dll and Evoq.PersonaBar.Library.dll, both in the bin path. Event message configured for UpgradeModule with BusinessController class.

observations: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI is classified as a Library type extension, not a Module type
The extension manifest declares Azure compatibility (azureCompatible=true)
Dependencies are properly configured: DNN Core 8.0+, Dnn.PersonaBar.UI v1.0.0, and DotNetNuke.Professional
Install/Uninstall SQL scripts create and drop stored procedures for task management (PersonaBar_Evoq_GetTasks, PersonaBar_Evoq_GetTask)
Version upgrade versions list includes 01.00.00 and 01.05.00
The Install Extension wizard is a 5-step process starting with package upload
Extension details support editing of Friendly Name, Icon, Description, Version, Owner info but Name field is read-only
License acceptance checkbox is available in the License tab
No UI found for viewing dependencies directly - dependency checking happens during installation
Delete/uninstall icons open the edit view; actual uninstallation may require different UI flow
